title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Alcohol Poisoning
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A competitive American frat bro drinks himself to death during an escalating international drinking game competition, where cultural machismo and peer pressure override every bodily warning sign.

death_teaser: He came to win. He left in a body bag.
